div.class: widget_text so-panel widget widget_custom_html panel-first-child panel-last-child

img.title: Home
img.rs-layer: Unlocking the world through language, expeditionary learning, and love
Global Prep Academy is a Pre K - 6 Dual Language Elementary housed within IPS Riverside #44.
Global Prep was created through the Innovation School partnership with IPS. Students both in and outside of IPS district boundaries are able to enroll at Global Prep.

div.class: widget_text so-panel widget widget_custom_html panel-first-child panel-last-child

ul.li: Literacy focus in all content areas
Extended day focused on individualized learning

form.label: Leave this field empty if you're human:

div.p: Copyright © 2019 Global Preparatory Academy at Riverside 44. All Right Reserved.

table.style: height: 207px; width: 0%; border-collapse: collapse; border-style: hidden; border-color: #ffffff; background-color: #ffffff;

div.p: Remote learning will begin on Monday, April 6 and will last through the end of the school year. The remote learning link on the website should be utilized by all families.

td.div: El aprendizaje remoto comenzará el lunes 6 de abril y durará hasta el final del año escolar. El enlace de aprendizaje remoto en el sitio web debe ser utilizado por todas las familias.
